title: X-Men: Days of Future Past: The Rogue Cut 2015 1080p BluRay x264
description:
In the future, the mutants are hunted mercilessly by the Sentinels, giant robots created by Bolivar Trask (Peter Dinklage). The few survivors have to live hidden, otherwise will also be killed. Among them are Professor Charles Xavier (Patrick Stewart), Magneto (Ian McKellen), Storm (Halle Berry), Kitty Pryde (Ellen Page) and Wolverine (Hugh Jackman), seeking a way to avoid that mutants are consumed. The medium is found to send Wolverine consciousness in a journey through time, towards the year 1970. There she occupies the Wolverine's body at the time, looking for the still young Xavier (James McAvoy) and Magneto (Michael Fassbender), that together , prevent this tragic future for mutants come true. See meeting the characters of the original franchise while they join forces with their younger characters in fighting Sentinels army are hunting mutants and humans.
